title: nbdev-hello
text: This file will become your README and also the index of your documentation.

title: nbdev-hello
text:
Developer Guide
If you are new to using nbdev here are some pointers to get you started.

Install nbdev_hello in Development mode
# make sure nbdev_hello package is installed in development mode
$ pip install -e .

# make changes under nbs/ directory
# ...

# compile to have changes apply to nbdev_hello
$ nbdev_prepare

title: nbdev-hello
text:
Usage

Installation
Install latest from the GitHub repository:
$ pip install git+https://github.com/s66erge/nbdev-hello.git
or from conda
$ conda install -c s66erge nbdev_hello
or from pypi
$ pip install nbdev_hello


Documentation
Documentation can be found hosted on this GitHub repository’s pages. Additionally you can find package manager specific guidelines on conda and pypi respectively.
